ofx:section.ofx:title: Including other files
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: There are two attributes available: include another fragement at this position. The container handles the way: container:true The inlcude file is merged at this position container:false the include file is referenced (in latex with input)

ofx:section.ofx:title: Container
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: Container can be used just as a grouping element for a section. If container=true, the title and label will be ignord. If a include is available, container controls the behaivior.
